sentences.sContent: HIS memories are addled, but the young member of Cocaine Anonymous can just about recall his formal drug education.
sentences.sContent_eng: HIS memories are addled, but the young member of Cocaine Anonymous can just about recall his formal drug education.
sentences.sCn: 他的记忆已经腐坏 但这位匿名的年轻可卡因吸食者还能勉强回忆起他受过的正规毒品宣传.

remMethod.val: add(增加) + le → 事情增加容易混乱 → 使昏乱
